predicate.note: Frames file for 'mislay' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to place or put down incorrectly

example.name: passive
example.text: Chief Inspector Peter Seacomb of the Criminal Investigation Department at the airport said , `` It [*EXP*-1] is not uncommon for property to be temporarily mislaid or misrouted [*-2] . ''
